ABOUT US


Libra Clips, CARD Plus, is a 13-year-old manufacturing Company supplying to some of the best corporate houses in India. Based in Mumbai we are professionally managed companies. We manufacture, import and export quality Identity card accessories to Far East, Europe and Africa.
Each of our products has a distinctive stamp of individuality and class. Our contemporary and classic designs bring forth variety and style and finish like no other collection can.
